title: House of the Dragon: What to expect from the Game of Thrones prequel
text:
Plans are afoot for HBO's first Game of Thrones prequel. Chris Mandle explains what to expect from House of the Dragon

One of Game of Thrones’ most well-known phrases – “Valar morghulis” – roughly translates to “all men must die”, but the wider universe inspired by George RR Martin’s A Song of Ice and Fire books shows no signs of waning.

After reports in September confirmed that HBO “is nearing a pilot commitment for a prequel series” based around Martin’s companion book Fire & Blood (Part one of the planned two-book tome was released in November 2018), the network is now making a 10-episode series called House of the Dragon.

Miguel Sapochnik, the director responsible for some of Thrones’ most...
description: Plans are afoot for HBO's first Game of Thrones prequel.
